mapper.select:
SELECT c.id, c.ciName, c.modelOrVersion, c.ntAccount, CONCAT(c.firstName, ' ', c.lastName) as userName, c.department, c.wbsNum, CAST(c.price AS DECIMAL(10,2)) as price, i.cost_center as costCenter, CAST(i.acquis_val AS DECIMAL(10,2)) as ifrsValue, CAST(i.book_val AS DECIMAL(10,2)) as ifrsAllResidualValue, CAST(p.book_val AS DECIMAL(10,2)) as prcAllResidualValue FROM sys_control c INNER JOIN sys_ifrs i ON c.wbsNum = i.wbs_element JOIN sys_prc p ON i.asset = p.asset
AND LOWER(c.ciName) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{ciName}), '%')
AND LOWER(c.ntAccount) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{ntAccount}), '%')
AND LOWER(c.department) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{department}), '%')
AND LOWER(c.costCenter) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{costCenter}), '%')
mapper.update:
INSERT INTO sys_ifrs ( asset, cost_center, capitalized_on, wbs_element, asset_class, currency, acquis_val, accum_dep, book_val ) VALUES
( #{item.asset}, #{item.costCenter}, #{item.capitalizedOn}, #{item.wbsElement}, #{item.assetClass}, #{item.currency}, #{item.acquisVal}, #{item.accumDep}, #{item.bookVal} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cost_center = VALUES(cost_center), capitalized_on = VALUES(capitalized_on), wbs_element = VALUES(wbs_element), asset_class = VALUES(asset_class), currency = VALUES(currency), acquis_val = VALUES(acquis_val), accum_dep = VALUES(accum_dep), book_val = VALUES(book_val)

INSERT INTO sys_prc ( asset, cost_center, capitalized_on, wbs_element, asset_class, currency, acquis_val, accum_dep, book_val ) VALUES

ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cost_center = VALUES(cost_center), capitalized_on = VALUES(capitalized_on), wbs_element = VALUES(wbs_element), asset_class = VALUES(asset_class), currency = VALUES(currency), acquis_val = VALUES(acquis_val), accum_dep = VALUES(accum_dep), book_val = VALUES(book_val)
